String.string:
Defeat Withered Petrax in the Pit of Petrax event dungeon 2x.

Use the 'Complete the Pit of Petrax' request in the Vanguard Requests (shortcut 'H') to teleport to Highwatch, and speak to Karmok to enter the Pit of Petrax.

You can use a device to the left in the dungeon to activate Withered Petrax so you can play the quest.
